## SuggestStateMatch.range property

Range of current match; for example `@foo|bar` (where \| is the cursor) - `from` is the start (= 0) - `to` is cursor position (= 4) - `end` is the end of the match (= 7)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
range: FromToEndParams;
```
